page.title: 11Employment in our area
page.content: Employment is difficult to find in our area and many people are self employ- ed,starting small businesses or hiring themselves out at peak times e.g.to farmers at haytime or lambing. At one time British Gypsum was the main employer for people livimg here but they are cutting down on their workers.Farmers too are cutting down on their workers they employ and runn- ing farms as a family business. Unemployment is causing concern in the whole country but in rural areas there are fewer companies that people can turn to for jobs. Young people leaving school with no hope of finding a job hang about the village pub or institute and come down to watch,and sometimes join in,games lessons. Many move away from the area to bigger places to find work.
